hero.bio-text: I am Alejandro. I have made this website to show myself and some of my skills as Junior Web Developer. Thanks for browsing!

more-about.more-about description:
A few years ago I began reorienting my professional profile to tech sector. Being a GNULinux user motivated me to start programming with Unix, later I learned C# for game development and I have recently begun to specialize in brand languages, creation and Web design in both Front-end and Back-end fields.</br>
    </br> In Back-end environment, I am familiar with the data base creation, access and modification with MySql and PHP, both remotely and locally with XAMPP. I have also made simple mobile applications with Android Studio and JavaScript.</br>
    </br> I have a Higher Sound Technician degree, so I am also able to develop various jobs in the audiovisual field, such as audio editing and postproduction, video editing or music production tasks. I joined GGJ as Sound Artist in Jannuary, in one of Barcelona's sites. We got most original game in site award!</br>
    </br> My intention is to update this page incorporating samples of my current skills and also of the new ones that I'll be acquiring. The Front-end section is made up of 5 videos below.</br>
more-about.more-about link: </br> Check out Bunny Love videogame from GGJ 2023! </br>

projects.projects-description: These videos describe practices and exercises I did while learning Web Development.
projects.first-video-description: Learning to prepare documents with brand language and to give them style.
projects.second-video-description: Tools to go from idea to layout and give shape to the project.
projects.third-video-description: Common programming concepts seen in JavaScript.
projects.fourth-video-description: Sirius heuristic evaluation test.</br>Jakob Nielsen UX evaluation.
projects.fifth-video-description: Bootstrap responsive design practices and exercises.

contact.contact-description: If you would like to have a personal website similar to this or with your custom design, or even an online store with WordPress and WooCommerce, </br> You can contact me by leaving a message in the form below, it will come directly to my email!
